posts.post_content:
Please let me know what you have to sell and send a photo or scan of front and back.

Thanks,
Rich

Hi Rich,

Saw your post and pulled out the Burch from my showcase

I have a solid and new slab SGC 5 (not rounded corners) that I would be happy to send you scans of if you send your email.

Priced at $300 and I would include shipping either PPFF or add 3% G&S

Thanks 
Wayne Brown
[url]edobrown@verizon.net[/url]

I am still looking for Brooklyn T206 cards - Burch (fielding), Dahlen, and Wilhelm (with bat).  Ideally they would be in the 1-4 range ungraded or graded.

Thanks,
Rich
